# run cns stress test client using run script and pass in parameters:

./run.sh -nt=1 -ns=1 -mps=200 -td=10 -tpt=10 http://<endpoint_host>:<endpoint_port>/CMB/Endpoint/recv/

# publish a single message with curl:

curl -v -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -X POST --data-binary @post2.data http://<cns_host>:<cns_port>/

# run a stress test using ab:

ab -n 5000 -c 10 -p post2.data -T application/x-www-form-urlencoded http://<cns_host>:<cns_port>/

# post data example:

Action=Publish&AWSAccessKeyId=I6M46U9SK6XW561TMQU3&Subject=stress+test+message&Message=%401333053697939*Thu+Mar+29+13%3A41%3A37+PDT+2012%&TopicArn=arn:cmb:cns:ccp:331756426855:ABC
